bibl.title: Intersecting Identities in Hellenistic and Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Marble Cakes and Russian Dolls. - Categorising the People: Ethnē in the Ptolemaic Tax-Registers [in part. in P. Count]. - Indians and Elephants at El Kanais: A Cautionary Tale [S.B. V, 8648 = I. Paneion 38]. - Who does a Roman think is Greek? - Organising Social Identities.
